title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno, and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via PyPI and chat with local models in 3 lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and RAG.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web dashboard for Ollama—chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, and pull models from Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Community Go CLI wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with colored output and interactive prompts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration—use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support for quick local deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU nodes and persistent storage.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for chatting with Ollama models locally from mobile or desktop apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models; slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models privately within your workspace.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama’s API with GenServer-based streaming for Phoenix/LiveView apps.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama binaries, modules, and development shells for NixOS.
